Posts.Content: Have a question about triple-negative breast cancer? Ask medical oncologist, Dr. Dennis Citrin, about the unique challenges of this type of breast cancer and emerging research on new treatment options.Â  Post your questions in this thread. Dr. Citrin will provide answers in the winter issue of Cancer Fighters Thrive magazine, available October 1 here and through a free subscription: http://www.cfthrive.com/subscribe.aspx
Posts.Title: Triple Negative Breast Cancer Q&A
